gantrytips.tip:
Each tab contains a summary and also a "tip-box" that displays relevant information as you mouse-over the elements in the template parameters. If you would like to find out more about these settings and the Gantry Framework in general please checkout these links:
  • Gantry Framework Homepage
  • Gantry Framework Documentation & Screencasts
If you need help relating to this template please contact us at Themeforest.
